author: astrutzenberg-godaddy
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

I would like to have the ability to export class definitions in a module as a means to automatically expose access to it.  Something like:

```
class MyClass{
   $MyMember1
   $MyMember2
}

export-modulemember -Class MyClass
```

The goal is to avoid having to pepper my scripts with explicit "using <modulename>" directives in my scripts/code


### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_
title: Expose a -Class <string[]> parameter for Export-ModuleMember
